name: Templar Chess
description:
Templar chess plunges you into the crusades, you are the great master of the Templars and lead the holy army to Jerusalem. the road is long and many battles await you.

You are the grand master of the Templars and lead the holy army to Jerusalem. The road is long and many battles await you. With a special combat system, on a small chess board, choose strategically your units and their movements in order to win the victory.

this is a prototype, the purpose of which is to obtain feedback on the combat system in order to improve it and to be able to insert it in another game of great strategy.

Don't hesitate to leave comments about your experience, thank you in advance.

To play:


the game ends when your opponent gives up (no more pawns), if you give up or if you occupy all three enemy squares (or vice versa).

Drag and drop the units on your squares to place them on the board. The units advance on their own at each turn, calculate well!

There are three units for each clan.

 Fighter/Knight   force 5 /life 10
Cavarly force 10 /life 20  
Archer Force 3 /life 6

if two units of the same force touch each other they are destroyed.
if the units are different the strongest one wins and suffers damage points (force - enemy force)

After each victory you will earn points that will allow you to get new pieces for the next battle. ( on the Army button card )
